# AVAudioNodeBus

**Type Alias**

The index of a bus on an audio node.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias AVAudioNodeBus = Int
```

## Discussion

An [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioNodeBus] represents a bus as a zero-based index. [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioNode] objects potentially have multiple input and output busses.

## Configuring an Input Format Bus

- **inputFormat(forBus:)**: Gets the input format for the bus you specify.
- **name(forInputBus:)**: Gets the name of the input bus you specify.
- **numberOfInputs**: The number of input busses for the node.
